Zeni: Okay, we'll do that! SHow the world who's boss, and one day, I'll be
strong like my brother, too.

(Perplex talking to Technosis)

Perplex: That's what you think, I have encountered hardships myself.

Technosis: Did you have 2 bots die while you sat back and didn't do anything
about it? Was one of them your lover?

Perplex: My parents...

Technosis: Oh, I'm sorry.

Perplex: Couldn't do a thing about it, I let them both die. Still feel like
your the only one in the qorld who is pained over the loss of loved ones?

Technosis: I stood there and let this monster take them away from me. They
became part of him as well, so now, using them he may come and try to catch
me, too.

Perplex: I'll protect you. I know what it's like for a monster to kill
someone you love...
----- Original Message -----
From: <logomorph@...>
To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
Sent: Sunday, November 19, 2000 5:08 PM
Subject: Re: MeowMix


> Trinity::
>
> She giggled. "You want to be like me? Yaaahooo. Alright. Two tigers,

> and feeing rather good right now.
